definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Local media and netizens have hence nicknamed Liu a "nisemusume" or "pseudo girl.
sentences.chinese: 在那之后，他被当地媒体和网民冠以“伪娘”称号。

sentences.english: The frequency hit high for the first time in 1979.
sentences.chinese: 授予老朋友称号的频率在1979年达到顶峰。

sentences.english: Once again, the phrase “sick man of Europe” is trotted out.
sentences.chinese: 又一次，欧洲病夫的称号落到英国的头上。

sentences.english: The label could be rescinded if the data is not produced, the officials said.
sentences.chinese: 官员们说，如果不提供数据，将取消称号。

sentences.english: You've proved yourself worthy of the title of Jedi Master.
sentences.chinese: 证明了自己无愧于绝地大师的称号。

sentences.english: By the General Logistics Department excellent medical worker title.
sentences.chinese: 获总后勤部优秀医务工作者称号。

sentences.english: Caused the air-to-ground missile to obtain "dropped from the clouds strikes the hand fiercely suddenly" the title.
sentences.chinese: 使得空地导弹获得了“从天而降的突烈击手”的称号。

sentences.english: that's given to someone who did something exceedingly good for the country.
sentences.chinese: 这是为国家做出伟大贡献的人而授予的一个称号。

sentences.english: The university conferred on him the title of LL.D.
sentences.chinese: 该学院授予他法学博士称号。

sentences.english: Continue obtaining title of Shanghai city infectious disease prevention and cure job advanced individual for 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 连续三年获上海市传染病防治工作先进个人的称号。

sentences.english: Nash has won the most valuable player honors in NBA All-Star GAME.
sentences.chinese: 纳什获得了NBA全明星队最有价值球员的荣誉称号。

sentences.english: Liu Xiang's coach, Sun Haiping, also scooped the best coach award.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔的教练孙海平也获得了最佳教练的称号。

sentences.english: Our group has won the fame of superior quality project of our province and high quality sample project of our city.
sentences.chinese: 多次获得省优质工程和市优质样板工程称号。

sentences.english: Already, she has been dubbed "Die Robin Hood Bankerin".
sentences.chinese: 她已经被冠以“银行家中的女罗宾汉”称号。

sentences.english: The Red Dragon is one of the names of Satan.
sentences.chinese: 那红龙是对撒旦的另一个称号。

sentences.english: The Queen conferred knighthoods on two magicians.
sentences.chinese: 女王以骑士的称号授予两个魔术家。

definition: special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
